title: Can you be platonic with more than one person? - Quora

response.answer_text: A man can be platonic with more than one woman because he can easily be a polygamist if he the opportunity. And most men secretly wish they could. I don’t think a woman could be platonic, she would want more, but with the same man.
Of course you can be platonic with more than one person. Platonic signifies you are not having sex, so you can have platonic friendships with as many people as you know and like. Enjoy!
I hate the word platonic. It means a dead-end one-on-one relationship with someone who doesn't want you. Strictly speaking, the answer is yes. It's called having a circle of acquaintances.
